data.name: Tetris® Effect Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
In Tetris Effect: Connected, the in-game soundtrack is essentially composed in real time based on the user’s actions. The mixes in the original soundtrack were thoughtfully crafted by Hydelic, sequenced and composed (almost entirely separately from the game) as full tracks to be played on their own.

The digital soundtrack includes 40 songs in MP3 and FLAC format, including the fan favorite “Connected (Yours Forever)” featuring Kate Brady.

Album Notes

Original Music by Hydelic

Composers: Noboru Mutoh and Takako Ishida with Kate Brady (Track 1, 29, 31), Mechi Pieretti (Track 24, 30), Alina Renae (Track 26)

Track 1, 29, 31 vocals by Kate Brady

Track 10 “City Lights” engineered by Satoru Ikeda and Shinichi Ishizuka. Featuring piano by Takako Ishida and drums by Yoshinori Imai

Track 24 and 30 “World of Colors” vocals by Mechi Pieretti, guitar by Kat Mcdowell

Track 26 vocals by Alina Renae

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space
